Description: Launch the main method in the `Launcher` class.
Read PDF files and convert Word files to PDF.
Extract information from text using `WordInfo` and populate `WordInfo` objects.
Compare WordInfo objects and identify changes.
Process and categorize differences using `Base` and `InfoDocUtil` classes.
Generate Word and PDF files for visual representation of changes.
Extract images from PDF files using `PDFToImageConverter`.
Compare images to identify visual differences.
Combine images of both PDFs with visual differences highlighted.
Create reports, logs, and README files.
